resources.string: Add word or expresión in English
You have to fill this fields
The description will help you to memorized better the learned word. You can include examples, grammatical category, syonym...etc
you can optionally record its pronounce, keeping push button
you can optionally add a image to a learning more effective
you choose a dificulty level, the system will ask you more times the hard words to a learning more effective
"In order to store the pronunciation of the words you need to accept the microphone permissions"
"To create a backup and save images related to your vocabulary, you need to accept the permissions, so if you uninstall the app, you will not lose what has been advanced"
"You do not have sufficient permissions to record"
"You do not have sufficient permissions to save images"
Press the button to record for a maximum of 20 seconds
You must press and hold to record
The name already exists, let`s choose other name
